SELECT DISTINCT TEERZEUGNIS FROM TEIL where 1=1
and TEERZEUGNIS like concat ('%',#{productLineName},'%')

select u.user_id,u.user_name,u.user_account,u.password,u.locked, r.role_id,r.role_name,r.available, p.permission_id,p.permission_name,p.type from [system_user] u inner join system_user_role ur on u.user_id = ur.user_id inner join system_role r on ur.role_id=r.role_id inner join system_role_permission rp on r.role_id=rp.role_id inner join system_permission p on rp.permission_id=p.permission_id where u.user_account=#{userAccount} and r.available='0' and p.available='0' and p.type='pl'

select w.WVTEIL,w.WVMERKMAL,w.WVWERTNR,w.WVWERT,w.WVPRUEFER,w.WVPRUEFMIT,w.WVMASCHINE,w.WVNEST,w.WVDATZEIT, p.PRVORNAME, r.PMNR,r.PMBEZ, a.ALARM_EW from WERTEVAR w LEFT JOIN ALARM_VALUES a ON w.WVTEIL=a.K1000 AND w.WVMERKMAL=a.K2000 AND w.WVWERTNR=A.K0000 LEFT JOIN PRUEFER p ON CONCAT(w.WVPRUEFER,'')=p.PRNAME LEFT JOIN PRUEFMIT r ON w.WVPRUEFMIT = r.PMPRUEFMIT where w.WVTEIL=#{teilId} AND w.WVMERKMAL=#{merkmalId} ORDER BY w.WVDATZEIT DESC
